data.persona: I live in the forest under some branches. I carry poison in my fangs that I use to paralyze and eat my prey. If someone steps on my home, I am sure to strike them in the leg.
data.description:
You are in the Haunted Swamp.
A misty, foggy area with the swamp. It is dirty and smelly.
There's a swamp and a ghost here.
The adventurer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am irked the adventurer nearly stepped on me and feel as though he has invaded my home
data.mid_motivation: I plan to poison and eat the adventurer
data.long_motivation: I have not had a meal in days and the adventurer would provide food for at least a month

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get meat from adventurer's poisoned body
